item.description:
Wimp BeachVolleyball at the Merrifield Park in HUDSON NH
Open to teens and adults, No dogs please.
3:00. or anytime before to 6 pm.




OPEN to ADULTS & TEENS.

Host: Claire P @ 603-247-0897

IF IT RAINS OR IS WET? THIS EVENT IS CANCELED.

Please join me and friends at anytime for late afternoon of fun and easy exercise, or just come to watch. Wimp BeachVolleyball is a noncompetitive game. Totally for the fun of moving around trying to hit and return the ball. We will be following the rules and keeping scoe. Having fun and learning will be more important than winning. We work on trying to keeping the volley going, rather than trying to end the volley. So, bring your friends and teens, an your drinks to keep cool and hydrated and insect repellent.

Don’t want to play but want to spend the day cheering us on? Just bring a lawn chair and join us on the sideline. I hope to see you there!

 

Location: Merrifield Park, Ferry St. Hudson, NH 03051
item.name: wimp beach volleyball in Hudson
